subject: My Name is Donald Berkly i a
body:
My Name is Donald Berkly i am the Attorney,
Solicitor and Administrator of  Mr JEFFERY SCOTT, a rich
philanthropist who died in the ill fated Kenyan air line  that crashed in Adis
Ababa Kenya. However, before he died had instructed me his solicitors and
Administrator of his estate and funds, that all his
wealth and proceeds from his estate ,to the tune of
$350m MILLION US DOLLAR should be dedicated for humanitarian and
philanthropic purposes.
Specifically, he directed that this fund should be given to the
motherless babies homes, the needy and HIV patients, through a
verifiable NGOS AND Religious organization OR honest and transparent
individuals. It is on this REASONS, i am contacting you to indicate
your interest, willingness and readiness to be a part of this
humanitarian project.
Please note that  60% will be dedicated to the
core charity, while the balance of 40% will be shared between you and
I who now stand as the facilitators of the said fund at 20% apiece,
Please you have to send your details as Follows.
(1)Your Full Name
(2)Your contact Address
(3)Your Tell-Phone number
(4)Your Occupation and Age
(5)A copy of your valid I.D
(6)Your Bank account Details
As soon as i receive your response expressing your willingness i shall
furnish you with more details and further actions.
yours sincerely
Donald Berkly

subject: Re:   My Name is Donald Berkly i a
body:
Dear Donald Berkly,

I am interested in your proposal and would like to help. However, I need more information about the project before I can commit. Could you please provide more details about how the funds will be used for charity? Also, could you tell me more about Mr. Jeffery Scott and his intentions for this money?

Best wishes,
Lang
